definition: Li Bai (701-762), famous Tang Dynasty poet
plum
surname Li
surname Bai

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: Li Bai is the descendent of Li Chong'er, grandson of Li Hao, King Liang Wuzhao.
sentences.chinese: 李白为凉式昭王李暠之孙李重耳的后裔。

sentences.english: Li Bai was a Tang poet of superb talent.
sentences.chinese: 李白是唐代一位才气横溢的诗人。

sentences.english: Lee hopes futilely to read aloud children but don'ts think of a wife, make the wife more angry.
sentences.chinese: 李白想念儿女却不想念妻子，让妻子更为恼火。

sentences.english: Li Bai, the superstar of poetry circles in Tang Dynasty, is deeply impressed by Taoism.
sentences.chinese: 唐代诗坛巨星李白，受道家思想影响甚深。

sentences.english: Li Bai was naughty and disliked studying when he was a child.
sentences.chinese: 李白小的时候非常调皮，不喜欢读书。

sentences.english: This poem is ascribed to the pen of Li Bai.
sentences.chinese: 大家说这首诗是出自李白之笔。

sentences.english: What does Nietzsche have to share with Li Bai?
sentences.chinese: 尼采和李白有共同语言吗？

sentences.english: This legend is about Li Bai, a great poet in Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 这是个关于中国唐代大诗人李白的传说。

sentences.english: It reinforced LI Bai's romanticism literature theory.
sentences.chinese: 它是对李白浪漫主义文学思想的补充。

sentences.english: The second chapter, including three sections, discusses the hyperbolic skill in Libai's poems.
sentences.chinese: 第二章用三小节探讨李白诗歌的夸张艺术。

sentences.english: Fang and Big Pang are divine birds which outstanding appearance in the Libai's poem.
sentences.chinese: 凤和大鹏是李白诗中突出的神鸟意象。

sentences.english: Li Bais cultural orientation reflects the time spirit and vogue of the scholars-bureaucrats of the flourishing Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 李白的文化取向是盛唐士风和时代精神的映射。

sentences.english: There is A Copy of Libai's Poems selected and copied by my great grandfather himself at my home.
sentences.chinese: 我家有一本太祖爷爷自己选编并抄写的《李白诗钞》。

sentences.english: Some of the exquisite sky green grass, and some pink and Li Bai.
sentences.chinese: 天空中的奇花有的绿草如茵，有的桃红李白。

sentences.english: Pink peach spring race, who were makeup language.
sentences.chinese: 桃红李白竞春光，谁共残妆语。

"sage of poetry", epithet of Du Fu 杜甫[Du4 Fu3]

same as Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子 (369-286 BC), Daoist author
